title: We Will Rock You
lyrics:
[intro] (Em-Em) (x) (Em-Em) (x)
 
(Em)Buddy you're a boy make a (Em)big noise
Playing in the (Em)street gonna be a big (A)man some (G)day
You got (Em)mud on your face, you (Em)big disgrace
(D)Kickin' your can all (A)over the place, singin' ...
 
[chorus]
(G)We (D)will, (Em)we (D)will (Em)rock you! (Em)
(G)We (D)will, (Em)we (D)will (Em)rock you! (Em)
 
(Em)Buddy you're a young man (Em)hard man
Shouting in the (Em)street gonna take on the (A)world some (G)day
You got (Em)blood on your face, you (Em)big disgrace
(D)Wavin' your banner all (A)over the place
 
[chorus]
(G)We (D)will, (Em)we (D)will (Em)rock you! (Em) (singin’)
(G)We (D)will, (Em)we (D)will (Em)rock you! (Em)
 
(Em)Buddy you're an old man (Em)poor man
Pleading with your (Em)eyes gonna make you some (A)peace some (G)day
You got (Em)mud on your face, (Em)big disgrace
Some(D)body better put you back (A)into your place
 
[chorus]
(G)We (D)will, (Em)we (D)will (Em)rock you! (Em) (singin’)
(G)We (D)will, (Em)we (D)will (Em)rock you! (Em) (everybody)
(G)We (D)will, (Em)we (D)will (Em)rock you! (Em) (singin’)
(G)We (D)will, (Em)we (D)will (C)rock you! (C)
 
[outro, kazoo solo]
(A-A) (x) (A-A) (x) (A-A) (x) (A-A) (x)
(A-A) (x) (A-A) (x) (A-A) (x) (A) [end]
